text: I am worried about the exam results, but I studied hard so I have a chance.
They haven't replied to my email yet, which means they are laughing at my proposal.
I feel awkward at parties, so I must be a completely unlikable person.
I didn't get the highest grade in the class. I am a total failure.
Ideally, I would have finished the project earlier, but finishing on time is also okay.
I feel guilty about taking a day off, therefore I must be lazy.
The presentation went well, although I stuttered once.
If I don't please everyone, then I am not a good person.
My friend seemed quiet today. I probably said something to offend her.
I am disappointed that I didn't win, but I enjoyed the competition.
